title: BRIEF-India Market Regulator Bans Morepen Lab From Accessing Securities Market For 1 Year
text:
BRIEF-India Market Regulator Bans Morepen Lab From Accessing Securities Market For 1 Year

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 20:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India Market Regulator Bans Morepen Lab From Accessing Securities Market For 1 Year Sept 24 (Reuters) - INDIA MARKET REGULATOR: * MOREPEN LABORATORIES PROHIBITED FROM ACCESSING SECURITIES MARKET, RESTRAINED FROM DEALING IN SECURITIES FOR PERIOD OF 1 YEAR

BRIEF-India Market Regulator Bans Morepen Lab From Accessing Securities Market For 1 Year
description: BRIEF-India Market Regulator Bans Morepen Lab From Accessing Securities Market For 1 Year
